title: League client opening, and thats about it
body: so does anyone else have an issue where they open the client, and the window pops up, but its completely black? and nothing loads within it? i have the newest version of league on my school laptop, and they dont block me launching anything, but the client itself just wont progress.

replies.body:
Hmmm... Are you certain League has the right system permissions to be able to patch? Try launching League from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*) to ensure League has the right privileges.

If you're still experiencing the same issues afterward, let me know.
